content: VC 2D-22 Cordless construction vacuum Compact and cordless construction vacuum for jobsite clean ups (dry), 3.5l tank (Nuron battery) ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Construction vacuums and dust extractors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Compact and lightweight – shoulder straps, slimline design and on-board accessory storage help to free your hands and space in your van Two power modes – switch between full mode for higher suction and eco mode for longer battery life as needed Stretchable vacuum hose – ideal when cleaning where space is limited, the hose extends up to 2.5m from the vacuum cleaner Filter cleaning – push-button filter cleaner helps dislodge dust/clogs to keep suction performance high and speed-up your clean-ups Less dust for better safety – helps to reduce harmful daily dust exposure and increase visibility for safer jobsites Applications Small area construction site cleaning Quick clean-ups of dry jobsite debris Mobile cleaning ### TECHNICAL DATA: Air Flow at Hose End: 48.73 l/s Max. Vacuum: 1.6 psi Container capacity: 4 l Technical Data | Max. Vacuum | 1.74 psi | Container capacity | 4 l | Dust capacity | 7 lb | Application | Cleaning | Power source | Cordless | A-weighted emission sound power level | 79 dB (A) | 1 | Suction capacity | 74 cfm | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2402233 - Vacuum cleaner VC 2D-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x VC 2D-22 Vacuum cleaner
